name: Knytt Levels Dark

user.name: compact
user.about: i also made a derpibooru theme but its not allowed apparently

additional_info:
Versioning
    • 1.5 - Fixed tileset viewers and level upload prompt. Basically satisfied with style as of now. CURRENT and (tentatively) FINAL
      1.4 - Made colors more 'dark' and less 'mocha'. Made div width an arbritrary percentage so it should look less bad on other resolutions. Added some fancy hover animations. Palette shamefully stolen from style 64023.
      1.3 - I just widened td, lol. Hopefully this looks ok on higher resolutions.
      1.2 - Made colors less binary. Palette shamefully stolen from style 91401.
      1.1 - Made things less dumpy. Re(added) borders and positioned things.
      1.0 - Initial release.
    • To-Do
    • minor touch-ups and optimization
